```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggtext)
library(extrafont)
library(showtext)
showtext_auto()
font_add_google("Lato", "lato") 
```


```{r}
options(scipen = 999)
readxl::read_excel("herbicidas_paraguai.xlsx", sheet = "Resumo Final") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:4) %>% 
  pivot_longer(c(`x2018_kg_ia`, `x2019_kg_ia`, `x2020_kg_ia`), 
               names_to = "year", values_to = "value") %>% 
  mutate(year = extract_numeric(year)) %>% 
  mutate(producto = str_to_lower(producto)) %>% 
  mutate(year = as.double(year)) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.double, ~round(., 1)) -> py
```

```{r}
py %>% 
  filter(!producto %in% c("total general", "dimetilamina", "outros")) %>% 
  mutate(producto = fct_relevel(producto,
                                levels = c("glifosato", "paraquat", "2,4-d",
                                           "cletodim", "glufosinato", "triclopir",
                                           "atrazina", "haloxifop-p- metil",
                                           "diuron", "fomesafen", "simazina",
                                           "picloram", "imazetapyr", "dicamba",
                                           "diclosulam", "flumioxazin", "fluroxipir", 
                                           "outros"))) -> py1
```


```{r}
py1 %>% 
#  filter(producto != "total general") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = value/1000, fill = producto)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.5,
           position = position_dodge2(width = 0.4)) +
  facet_wrap(~ producto, nrow = 5, scales = "free") +
#  coord_flip() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(2018, 2020, by = 1)) +
  geom_text(aes(label = round(value/1000,0)), size = 8) +
  labs(x = NULL,
       y = "Active ingredient (ton)") +
  theme_few(base_family = "lato") +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.title = element_markdown(size = 27),
        axis.text = element_markdown(size = 25),
        strip.text = element_markdown(size = 25))

ggsave("py.png", height = 10)
```
